alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 3:02PM EDT until April 05 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN AIKEN COUNTY... At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over USC Aiken, or over Aiken, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Aiken Municipal Airport around 310 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include New Holland and Hopeland Gardens. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 17 and 34. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
